turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Caramel Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like to buy the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to buy it in Tulsa, Oklahoma.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What part of town would you like to buy it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to buy it downtown Tulsa.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is a Starbucks at the Downtown Library.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the address?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 400 Civic Center

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there free parking nearby?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, there is free parking at the library's parking garage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What time is Starbuck's open on Tuesday?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 7 a.m. to 7 p.m.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What time is the location on Wednedsay?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's open from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order my drink ahead?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, you can use the mobile app.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order the my drink at 7:30 a.m. on Wednesday?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What will be the date?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: March 6, 2019

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size of drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The size is tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you want extra whip cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want extra whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything, else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.
